info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 8:17AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN ST. JOSEPH...NORTHERN LA PORTE...SOUTHWESTERN CASS AND BERRIEN COUNTIES THROUGH 900 AM EDT/800 AM CDT/... At 817 AM EDT/717 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Trail Creek, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Michigan City around 820 AM EDT. Three Oaks around 825 AM EDT. Buchanan around 840 AM EDT. Berrien Springs around 845 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Union Pier, Glendora, Sodus, Waterford, New Troy, Michiana Shores, Harbert, Bertrand, Chain-o-lakes, and Sawyer. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 41 and 82. Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 34 and 45. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 0 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
